pageContext.claim: “We had the highest poll number -- Rasmussen -- 53, but they say you could add 10 to it. A lot of people say you could add more than 10 to it because a lot of people just don't want to talk about it, but they want to vote for Trump.”
pageContext.analysis: You shouldn't add 10 points to any poll. Rasmussen is an outlier consistently giving Trump higher ratings than more reputable polls. When the president made these remarks, the 538 poll average had him at 42 percent approval.
